"Capture the $(0)!": "Use the Capture Device to capture the $(0)!"
"Use the Capture Device to capture the $(0)!"
"Capture Device activations remaining\u3000$(0) times left."
"This Capture Device cannot be used."

"The directive has changed!
Please capture the $(0)."

"We've transferred a capture device to point $(0).
All ARKS, assist to capture the target!
Repeat, you must capture the target."
"We have confirmed that the transfer of the capture target was successful. We appreciate that you acted so quickly despite the rapid change of orders."
"It is impossible to continue the capture mission. We have no choice but to abort. Please return to the regular mission."
"The target is within capture range! Now, activate the capture device!"
"There's no problem with your timing, just next time, please make sure it doesn't leave the capture field."
"You can't use the capture device right now. Please lure the capture target in range first."
"Capture successful; transfer completion confirmed."
"Capture failed. The capture device's range is limited. Please don't let it escape from the capture field."
"The objective is only to capture the target. Please avoid attacking it as much as possible."
"The capture target's vital signs have disappeared. There's nothing we can do now except wait for another one to appear."
"The transfer equipment is under heavy load and can only be used one more time. Make this one count."

"There's been a change in your orders.
You are to immediately capture the $(0)."

"A capture device was transferred to $(0).
All ARKS are to lure the target inside of the device and capture it!"
"The capture target has been successfully transferred. Sorry about the quick change of plans. You've done well."
"Attempting to use the capture device anymore would be too dangerous. We have to abort. Please return to the regular mission."
"The target is within capture range. Activate the capture device."
"Your timing was perfect, but don't let it leave the capture field next time."
"You can't use the capture device yet. Lead the target in range first."
"Capture successful. Transferring."
"Capturing the target failed."
"The objective is strictly to capture the target. You should use as little force as possible."
"The target's vitals have faded. That's it. Next time, then."
"The transfer equipment is under heavy load, you only have one more chance... Make the most of it."

"W-Wait! Switch to capturing the target!
Please capture the $(0)!"

"Capture device is at $(0)!
Lure it in to be captured somehow!"
"You captured the target! And you managed to do it even after we changed your orders so quickly! Way to go!"
"I-it's impossible now... Please go back to the regular mission."
"The target is in capture range! Now! Activate the capture device!"
"There's nothing wrong with your timing. Once it's inside the capture field, keep it pinned down!"

"/face4 The capture device can't be used yet.
First, lure the target within range!"

"/face2 Subject capture is a success!
Transferring the specimen now!"

"/face4 Oh no! The capture is a failure!
Please be careful, the capture device has
a limited effective range!"
"Aah, um, er...! You're only supposed to capture the target! Try not to attack it if you can!"

"/face6 Target's vital signs lost...
...Well, no way to capture it now.
Next time, for sure."

"The transfer device is low on power...
Only one chance left!
Please be careful!"
"Incoming a change in orders. Please capture the $(0) instead."
"A capture device has been placed at $(0). Lure the target and capture it. No further orders."
"Target capture confirmed. We appreciate your swift response to the change in orders."

"Target capture failed.
Please resume your normal mission."

"捕獲有効範囲内に対象を確認。
捕獲装置を起動してください。"

"タイミングは問題なし。
後は、対象を有効範囲内で
捉えるように。"

"今、捕獲装置は使用不可能です。
まずは対象を捕獲範囲内に
誘導してください。"

"対象捕獲、確認。
転送シーケンスに移ります。"

"捕獲失敗を確認。
捕獲装置の有効範囲を確認し
再度、捕獲を行ってください。"

"再確認。目的は対象の捕獲です。
捕獲対象を攻撃しないように。"

"捕獲対象、反応消失しました。
捕獲はまた、次の機会に。"

"転送装置負荷限界まで
あと1回となります。
慎重な試行を求めます。"

"目標変更です！
$(0)を
捕獲してもらえますか！"

"捕獲装置を$(0)へ用意しました。
対象を誘導して、捕獲してください！"

"捕獲成功を確認しました！
急な目標変更にも即刻対応！
流石、といった感じですね！"

"うーん、捕獲任務はここまでですね。
何事も諦めが肝心ですし
通常任務に戻りましょう！"

"対象、捕獲有効範囲内に捕捉！
装置を起動してください！"

"ああっ、惜しい！
タイミングは完璧だったんですが
対象が逃げちゃったみたいですね！"

"捕獲装置はまだ起動できません！
まずは捕獲対象を範囲内に
誘導しましょう！"

"捕獲成功、確認しました！
そのまま転送しちゃいます！"

"捕獲失敗です。
範囲内から対象を逃がさないようにして
もう一度、挑戦してみましょう。"

"おっと、現在の目標は捕獲ですよー！
捕獲対象への攻撃は、なるべーく
控えてもらえると嬉しいです！"

"捕獲対象の反応、消失。
うーん、残念ですが仕方ありません。
次の機会を待ちましょう！"

"捕獲装置の使用回数、あと１回！
なので、次でずばっと
決めちゃいましょう！"
